description:
Artist In Residence: Manawa Tapu

Tristan (Manawa Tapu) is of Te Rewara descent from The Far North region of New Zealand. His tattoo style blends his knowledge of both traditional Maori art and woodcarving that’s been passed down for hundreds of years.

Roark is proud to present a collection designed entirely alongside Manawa Tapu, implementing his art throughout each and every piece. This limited edition Gonzo Button Up is an organic cotton shirt with a camp-style collar. The design is woven into the fabric for durability and soft hand feel.
name: Roark Gonzo Manawa Tapu Woven - Mens
